high.description: The highest price of the item

low.description: The lowest price of the item

time.description: The timestamp when the data was recorded

id.description: The unique identifier for the item

avg_high_price.description: The average of the highest prices

avg_low_price.description: The average of the lowest prices

high_price_volume.description: The volume of trades at the highest average price

low_price_volume.description: The volume of trades at the lowest average price

high_time.description: The timestamp when the highest price was recorded

low_time.description: The timestamp when the lowest price was recorded
